creator: rmoya@reuna.cl
text:
Hi all, to starting tomcat 4.0.1, the next error is a console:

 Starting Tomcat 4.0.3
     [java] Starting service Tomcat-Standalone
     [java] Apache Tomcat/4.0.3
     [java] java.util.zip.ZipException: invalid CEN header (bad signature)
     [java]     at java.util.zip.ZipFile.open(Native Method)
     [java]     at java.util.zip.ZipFile.<init>(ZipFile.java:110)
     [java]     at java.util.jar.JarFile.<init>(JarFile.java:115)
     [java]     at java.util.jar.JarFile.<init>(JarFile.java:82)
     [java]     at org.apache.catalina.loader.WebappLoader.setRepositories
(WebappLoader.java:1005)
     [java]     at org.apache.catalina.loader.WebappLoader.start
(WebappLoader.java:628)
     [java]     at org.apache.catalina.core.ContainerBase.start
(ContainerBase.java:1100)
     [java]     at org.apache.catalina.core.StandardContext.start
(StandardContext.java:3345)
     [java]     at org.apache.catalina.core.ContainerBase.addChild
(ContainerBase.java:785)
     [java]     at org.apache.catalina.core.StandardHost.addChild
(StandardHost.java:454)

(StandardHost.java:714)

(HostConfig.java:300)
     [java]     at org.apache.catalina.startup.HostConfig.start
(HostConfig.java:389)

(HostConfig.java:232)
     [java]     at org.apache.catalina.util.LifecycleSupport.fireLifecycleEvent
(LifecycleSupport.java:155)
     [java]     at org.apache.catalina.core.ContainerBase.start
(ContainerBase.java:1131)
     [java]     at org.apache.catalina.core.StandardHost.start
(StandardHost.java:614)
     [java]     at org.apache.catalina.core.ContainerBase.start
(ContainerBase.java:1123)
     [java]     at org.apache.catalina.core.StandardEngine.start
(StandardEngine.java:343)
     [java]     at org.apache.catalina.core.StandardService.start
(StandardService.java:388)
     [java]     at org.apache.catalina.core.StandardServer.start
(StandardServer.java:506)
     [java]     at org.apache.catalina.startup.Catalina.start(Catalina.java:781)
     [java]     at org.apache.catalina.startup.Catalina.execute
(Catalina.java:681)

(Catalina.java:179)

     [java]     at org.apache.catalina.startup.Bootstrap.main
(Bootstrap.java:243)

creator: remm@apache.org
text:
Please provide a detailed (self contained) example to reproduce this. I've 
never personally experienced this behavior (with a valid JAR file, at least).
